MaterialityTopicQstn.name: MaterialityTopicQstn
MaterialityTopicQstn.description: Represents the mapping between the materiality assessment topics and the materiality assessment survey questions.

ImpactType.description: The type of impact associated with the survey question.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaterialityAssessmentId.description: The materiality assessment associated with the question.

MaterialityTopicId.description: The materiality assessment topic associated with the question.

Name.description: The name of this materiality assessment topic question.
